name: outris-identity
description: Model Context Protocol server for identity verification - investigate phone numbers and emails, find linked identities, check platform registrations, and detect data breaches.

tools.name: get_identity_profile
tools.description: Get complete identity profile for a phone or email

tools.name: get_name
tools.description: Find names linked to a phone number

tools.name: get_email
tools.description: Find emails linked to a phone number

tools.name: get_address
tools.description: Find addresses linked to a phone number

tools.name: get_alternate_phones
tools.description: Find alternate phone numbers for the same person

tools.name: check_digital_commerce_activity
tools.description: Check ecommerce, travel, and quick-commerce activity

tools.name: check_breaches
tools.description: Detect if phone/email appears in known data breaches

transports.description: Stateless HTTP transport (recommended for cloud deployments)

features.name: Identity Resolution
features.description: Find names, emails, and addresses linked to phone numbers

features.name: Platform Detection
features.description: Detect registration on 31+ Indian platforms + 3 global platforms

features.name: Commerce Activity
features.description: Check ecommerce, travel, and quick-commerce activity

features.name: Breach Detection
features.description: Identify if phone/email appears in known data breaches

features.name: Multiple Transports
features.description: Support for Streamable HTTP (primary), SSE (legacy), and STDIO (local)

features.name: Credit System
features.description: Fair usage pricing with credits per tool call

features.name: Global Coverage
features.description: Full India coverage + partial global support

pricing.description: Tools consume credits from account balance

changelog.2.0.0: Added Streamable HTTP transport (new MCP spec), STDIO support for local installation, improved documentation
